price: Wọn yóò rọ̀gbọ̀kú sórí àwọn ibùsùn tí wọ́n tò ní ọ̀wọ̀ọ̀wọ́. A sì máa fún wọn ní àwọn ìyàwó ẹlẹ́yinjú ẹgẹ́.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
